data.name: Sense the Shift - respond, re-frame, re-imagine
data.summary:
The first edition of this series of online mentorship will be led by Sonia Manchanda, Founding Partner of Spread Design and Innovation where she will be talking about reimagination through design.

Respond, Reframe, Reimagine!
Moving past the time for reaction, let's sense the shifts as they are happening, respond creatively, reframe threats as wicked challenges to be overcome and reimagine Everything! Advance in the time of adversity by making design your natural adaptive sense!
